# Omics Data Analysis and Interpretation

## Genomics

### Key Concepts
- Whole Genome Sequencing (WGS) Analysis
- Variant Calling and Analysis
- Genome Assembly and Annotation
- Comparative Genomics
- Population Genomics

### Recommended Resources
- **Tools and Software**:
  - [GATK](https://gatk.broadinstitute.org/) - Genome Analysis Toolkit
  - [BWA](http://bio-bwa.sourceforge.net/) - Burrows-Wheeler Aligner
  - [SAMtools](http://www.htslib.org/) - Sequence Alignment/Map tools
  - [IGV](https://software.broadinstitute.org/software/igv/) - Integrative Genomics Viewer

- **Learning Resources**:
  - [GATK Best Practices](https://gatk.broadinstitute.org/hc/en-us/articles/360035890711-Best-Practices-Tutorials)
  - [Galaxy Training Network](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/genomics/)

## Transcriptomics

### Key Concepts
- RNA-Seq Data Analysis
- Differential Expression Analysis
- Alternative Splicing Analysis
- Single-Cell RNA-Seq
- Long-Read RNA Sequencing

### Recommended Resources
- **Tools and Software**:
  - [DESeq2](https://bioconductor.org/packages/release/bioc/html/DESeq2.html) - Differential Expression Analysis
  - [STAR](https://github.com/alexdobin/STAR) - RNA-Seq Aligner
  - [Seurat](https://satijalab.org/seurat/) - Single-Cell Analysis
  - [Scanpy](https://scanpy.readthedocs.io/) - Single-Cell Analysis in Python

- **Learning Resources**:
  - [RNA-Seq Analysis Course](https://www.ebi.ac.uk/training/online/courses/functional-genomics-ii-common-technologies-and-data-analysis-methods/rna-sequencing/)
  - [Single-Cell RNA-Seq Analysis](https://www.ebi.ac.uk/training/online/courses/single-cell-rna-seq-analysis/)

## Proteomics

### Key Concepts
- Mass Spectrometry Data Analysis
- Protein Identification and Quantification
- Post-Translational Modifications
- Protein-Protein Interactions
- Structural Proteomics

### Recommended Resources
- **Tools and Software**:
  - [MaxQuant](https://www.maxquant.org/) - Quantitative Proteomics
  - [OpenMS](https://www.openms.de/) - Open Source Mass Spectrometry
  - [Perseus](https://maxquant.net/perseus/) - Proteomics Data Analysis
  - [STRING](https://string-db.org/) - Protein-Protein Interaction Networks

- **Learning Resources**:
  - [Proteomics Data Analysis Course](https://www.ebi.ac.uk/training/online/courses/proteomics-data-analysis/)
  - [MaxQuant Tutorials](https://www.maxquant.org/tutorials)

## Metabolomics

### Key Concepts
- Metabolite Identification
- Metabolic Pathway Analysis
- Flux Balance Analysis
- Metabolite Profiling
- Integration with Other Omics Data

### Recommended Resources
- **Tools and Software**:
  - [XCMS Online](https://xcmsonline.scripps.edu/) - Metabolomics Data Processing
  - [MetaboAnalyst](https://www.metaboanalyst.ca/) - Comprehensive Metabolomics Analysis
  - [MZmine](http://mzmine.github.io/) - Mass Spectrometry Data Processing
  - [KEGG](https://www.genome.jp/kegg/) - Metabolic Pathways Database

- **Learning Resources**:
  - [Metabolomics Society Training](https://metabolomicssociety.org/resources/training)
  - [Metabolomics Data Analysis Course](https://www.ebi.ac.uk/training/online/courses/metabolomics-data-analysis/)

## Epigenomics

### Key Concepts
- DNA Methylation Analysis
- Chromatin Accessibility (ATAC-Seq)
- Histone Modification Analysis
- ChIP-Seq Analysis
- Epigenetic Regulation

### Recommended Resources
- **Tools and Software**:
  - [Bismark](https://www.bioinformatics.babraham.ac.uk/projects/bismark/) - DNA Methylation Analysis
  - [MACS2](https://github.com/macs3-project/MACS) - ChIP-Seq Peak Calling
  - [HOMER](http://homer.ucsd.edu/homer/) - Motif Discovery
  - [DeepTools](https://deeptools.readthedocs.io/) - ChIP-Seq Data Analysis

- **Learning Resources**:
  - [Epigenomics Data Analysis Course](https://www.ebi.ac.uk/training/online/courses/epigenomics-data-analysis/)
  - [ChIP-Seq Analysis Tutorial](https://hbctraining.github.io/Intro-to-ChIPseq/)

## Metagenomics

### Key Concepts
- 16S rRNA Analysis
- Shotgun Metagenomics
- Taxonomic Classification
- Functional Profiling
- Microbial Community Analysis

### Recommended Resources
- **Tools and Software**:
  - [QIIME2](https://qiime2.org/) - Microbiome Analysis
  - [MetaPhlAn](https://huttenhower.sph.harvard.edu/metaphlan/) - Metagenomic Profiling
  - [Kraken2](https://ccb.jhu.edu/software/kraken2/) - Taxonomic Classification
  - [MG-RAST](https://www.mg-rast.org/) - Metagenomics Analysis Server

- **Learning Resources**:
  - [QIIME2 Tutorials](https://docs.qiime2.org/2023.7/tutorials/)
  - [Metagenomics Analysis Course](https://www.ebi.ac.uk/training/online/courses/metagenomics-data-analysis/)

## Network and Pathway Analysis

### Key Concepts
- Gene Regulatory Networks
- Protein-Protein Interaction Networks
- Metabolic Networks
- Pathway Enrichment Analysis
- Network Visualization

### Recommended Resources
- **Tools and Software**:
  - [Cytoscape](https://cytoscape.org/) - Network Visualization
  - [STRING](https://string-db.org/) - Protein Interaction Networks
  - [GSEA](https://www.gsea-msigdb.org/gsea/index.jsp) - Gene Set Enrichment Analysis
  - [Reactome](https://reactome.org/) - Pathway Database

- **Learning Resources**:
  - [Cytoscape Tutorials](https://cytoscape.org/documentation_users.html)
  - [Pathway Analysis Course](https://www.ebi.ac.uk/training/online/courses/pathway-analysis/)
